title: China Plans Reprieve for Tech Giants, Including Delaying New Rules, as Economy Slows - The Wall Street Journal
content: China Plans Reprieve for Tech Giants, Including Delaying New Rules, as Economy Slows  The Wall Street Journal
description: China is preparing to hit pause on its monthslong campaign against technology companies, according to people familiar with the matter, as officials seek to arrest a rapid deterioration in the countryâ€™s economic outlook.
